thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Raly

author: Raly
title: Raly
text:
Trip is good for a brief overview of key places of interest in Tassie.
Terry is a wonderful guide. Transport was comfortable. All our accomodation was good except the one night in the Waratah Hotel where our room has no ensuite and is really tiny that you can't fit a chair in . We understand there were other rooms with ensuite. The kitchen did not even have enough bowls for all the members in our team. In my opinion the pyhsical rating should be upgraded to 3.
